description: Rice plants were exogenously sprayed with synthetic phenyl-urea cytokinin under drought stress. Leaf proteome was analyzed for the differential expression of proteins.

modifications.name: No PTMs are included in the dataset

terms.name: Reference
terms.value: Gujjar RS, Banyen P, Chuekong W, Worakan P, Roytrakul S, Supaibulwatana K. A Synthetic Cytokinin Improves Photosynthesis in Rice under Drought Stress by Modulating the Abundance of Proteins Related to Stomatal Conductance, Chlorophyll Contents, and Rubisco Activity. Plants (Basel). 2020 9(9)

title: Rice (Pathumthani1) flag leaf LC-MSMS under cytokinin and drought treatment
